message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many of our previous customers. I believe it could be a great asset to you. For this unique opportunity, I am offering it to you for $200. Let me know if you're interested in exploring this further.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and would like to adjust the price to meet your needs while still valuing the product appropriately. For this product, I propose an offer of $150. This price reflects the value we place on it while remaining competitive for you. Please let me know if this works for you.

I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, but $150 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

I understand your position, Bob. To find a balance between the value we place on the product and your budget, I would like to propose a price of $125. This is a slight increase from your last offer, reflecting the quality and benefits of the product. I hope this revised price will be more agreeable to you. Looking forward to your response.

I appreciate your willingness to find a balance, but $125 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $110 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

Considering your feedback and your desire to find a fair price, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $115 for the product. This price takes into account both the value of the product and your budget. I hope this revised offer will be acceptable to you.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, but $115 is still a bit higher than I'd like to pay. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

I understand your position and am willing to compromise. For the product, I propose a final offer of $110. This price reflects a reasonable balance between the value of the product and your budget. I hope this will be a satisfactory solution for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $110. I'm willing to meet you at $100. If I don't get a better offer, I'll have to consider buying from John for $80.
